website_summaries.verdict: Channeling classic tennis model aesthetic for timeless casual style, the Converse Courtlandt are oxford shoes that are cut in a vintage low-top silhouette, offering a throwback feel. These Converse sneakers revisit courtside history while built with updated features that deliver comfort that'll have one ready to take on the day in style.These shoes may have some tweaks to them but they capture the essence of competing on the court for grappling with the daily grind.
pros: Heaps of impressed purchasers are definitely happy with the Converse Courtlandt
The low-top sneakers are much-anticipated by a great number of skaters as they have confirmed that they are good for skating
A lot of reviews have mentioned that these Converse shoes are actually comfortable
These tennis-inspired kicks are generally well-made
Many have commented that they just love the pair’s clean design
A handful of users claim that the Courtlandt looks super good on feet
Some have noticed that these kicks are surprisingly easy to clean
They are very nice casual shoes, based on a good number of buyers
cons: A certain user has observed that the shoe’s fit around the toe box is a bit tight
Several have wished that these shoes have more available sizes for those with wide feet

customer_reviews.title: Eh.. they're ok
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I got these was because I couldn't find the el distrito converse at the time. For converse they are on the tight side especially in terms of width. I'm sure most people agree converse run quite big and wide (which is why i love them) but these dont. They're ok. Not really liking the suede detail in the front because it sort of makes the shoe look like it's dirty due to the tone difference in color.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia182

customer_reviews.title: Heads up!
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes but I could barely get them on my feet nevermind standing and walking. Apparently shoemakers have juggled their sizing criteria. In the last six months, I have had to return shoes that were too small and get one size larger. I have worn the same size shoe since high school and shoes bought two years ago in that size still fit fine but new shoes oddly don't. Guess that I should stop buying online and make my lazy self actually visit a brick and mortar store.
customer_reviews.author: Zedder240

customer_reviews.title: Didn't expect
customer_reviews.text: Well, let me start with that I thought It would have been larger for me, since converse sizing is a little different, but it fits just like normal one, even though it is a 1 size larger. Let me also say that they look much better live, than in pictures. was expecting way worse product for 12 dollars, apparently, I was wrong! hope that they are durable as well. If so, may get another one!
customer_reviews.author: Shako

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. But most of all the comfort inside. Very comfortable. The only thing is i wish they sold this shoe for Wide feet. Had to return because it was a tight fit. But loved everything else
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: slim fit.. shoe
customer_reviews.text: I own a single size larger (13) and they fit great width wise but are too long, so ordered in my size but these are super tight in the toe box as a 12, and over half an inch skinnier.
customer_reviews.author: D. Civili

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are cheap looking. The "suede" on them is not real. When I looked at them they said women's 7.5, I got a mens 7.5, too big. Not worth the $55 price tag. Gave them to my sister who has bigger feet than me. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Check the sizing for converse before you buy these!!
customer_reviews.text: They say these shoes run a size or a half size too big so be sure to do some research first. That being said they come out a leetle bit small when you get them, stretch them and wear them a little at home first before an all day thing. I like the way they look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter is happy with shoe look and fit
customer_reviews.text: No dislike teenage daughter likes converse product she wanted this style of shoe to wear with jeans
customer_reviews.author: sandra jones

customer_reviews.title: Men’s sizes
customer_reviews.text: Nowhere in the description does it say men sizes I ordered a 6.5... apparently a 6.5 in men’s which is an 8 in women’s no possible way they will ever fit me but perfect size for my son so not all is lost I’ll just order vans for myself like I should have
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Fun throwback sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I've had numerous pairs of chucks in the past and always loved them despite the sole being a little thin. That being the case, I decided to try out the low top sneaker instead. I just got them in yesterday and I have to say that I'm not disappointed. The shoe has a nice cushioned sole, thick tongue and is generally well made. Even though these are men's shoe sizes, I ordered an equivalent to my women's size (size 8) and they fit quite well. Definitely happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CourtneyG

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality, even the stitches are ripping apart!
customer_reviews.text: Worst quality ever! My daughter has been using them for less than 2 months and they’re already ripping apart. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 13-year-old son because I was hoping Converse shoes would hold up better than less expensive shoes. Unfortunately, these shoes fell apart within three weeks. The rubber around the bottom came unglued quickly, and the canvas material by the big toe shredded within a couple of weeks. Also, the tongue is so short that it doesn't even come up underneath the last row of laces. Terrible quality!
customer_reviews.author: A. Keusal

customer_reviews.title: A little on the thin side
customer_reviews.text: The pattern on the back tends to snags your pants
customer_reviews.author: B Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 6.5 womens, it fit really well, bought months ago and the shoes still hold up really well!
customer_reviews.author: Dory

customer_reviews.title: They keep your feet dry
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing, they let you walk around without your feet getting dirty, i plan on buying another pair in two days because i can't get enough.
customer_reviews.author: Rdavallou

customer_reviews.title: Nice style, poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: The rubber sole that comes up around the side of shoe came loose second day of wearing the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoes
customer_reviews.text: these came as expected. They are cool and we like them.
customer_reviews.author: Dagmar

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: My first ever pair of converse. I wear an 11-11 1/2 in most shoes so I ordered them in 11 m and they fit great. I scored these for $15 and the very next day they were back up to $55
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: Typical converse poor quality
customer_reviews.text: A seam blew after one week. Went back to Vans.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Elam

customer_reviews.title: Fake Converse
customer_reviews.text: Should have known better by the price. Came in a bag, not a converse box. Hurt my feet the same day I put on.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Is this quality shoes ?! 2 weeks could not stand the daily walk, return the money!
customer_reviews.author: Evgenii Pavlenko

customer_reviews.title: Size just right
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son and he loves them
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter usually wears a size 5 in kids and I bought size 5.5 in these, she said it's very comfortable and received compliments the first day she wore them. The foot bed is cushioned. The tongue is a little short and it's padded.
customer_reviews.author: cbread

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They’re very comfortable, they look good and they’re easy to clean. I would definitely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: MrRoboticDJ

customer_reviews.title: You have good deals
customer_reviews.text: It was gift fir my sister fir her birthday she is in love with them thank you amazon
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Trujillo

product_meta.title: Converse Unisex Adults’ Lifestyle Courtlandt Ox Low-Top Sneakers
